Lunarpine arrives at the Ark in time to see the new Maximal approach 
Unitron. he heard Shadow Wings exclamation about a hostage situation 
so he ducked behind some boulders so he wouldn't be seen, Shadow 
Wings scent was to close to Unitron for his comfort.he loaded a fresh-
power cell into his pulse rifle and cocked it for ready use. 

the only thought going through his head at that moment was "There's 
no bargaining with Terrorists and hostages take thier chances."

-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Shadow Wing/Spears::
> 
> Shadow Wing::
> She turned and walked away.  She transformed into owl mode and 
tried 
> to fly off, but her damaged wing wouldn't let her fly.  She 
> transformed back into bot mode and ran over to Spears.
> "Any ideas?"
> 
> Spears::
> "Yeah I got one. You stay right here and don't move." 
> Spears rose up and walked over to Unitron with a spear in her hand 
> raised and aimed at Unitron.
> "OK, now it's my turn. Let him go." she walked right up to Unitron 
> and stood a few feet away from him with the spear in her hand.
> "I said let him go!"
